long_description: The Greenfield Kickstand keeps a bike standing on its own 2 wheels-no more looking for a parking meter or tree to lean it against! 285mm length works best for 26 in. wheeled bikes, but can be cut to fit smaller bikes. Metal alloy is lightweight and strong for confident support.
short_description: The Greenfield Kickstand keeps a bike standing on its own 2 wheels-no more looking for a parking meter or tree to lean it against!
